nodes.text: Lesu was a world located in the Lesu system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Dail sector. Around 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of Malakin Enterprises, a criminal organization that constituted a part of the Tenloss Syndicate.

Lesu was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Lesu system, and therefore Lesu itself, in grid square Q-18.
